Reviews.Content: First HDX was dead in arrival.  Problem recognizing AT&T; SIM card.  I had to do a lot of trouble shooting over the mayday feature before Amazon agreed to swap for a new one,

Reviews.Title: Of course I love it! Duh!
Reviews.Author: Aimee
Reviews.Content: I love this thing! I only have one small complaint and that is that it drops wifi more than I'd like. Which is kind of a nuisance. But other than that, there really are no cons.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Catt
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas gift for my sister, said best gift ever, she reads books off of it and uses it as a computer

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Carol C Ritter
Reviews.Content: This whole kindle thing is pretty new for me, but I do enjoy playing the game on it and the music. I never thought this would be so easy and so much fun, glad my grandkids talked me into getting it.I'm not very good at it  but its fun to have.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Pamela Luccas
Reviews.Content: I love the size, quality and everything about my new Kindle Fire HDX.  It is great on trips, I can watch movies in flight, read my favorite books and magazines and keep updated on facebook and email when I travel.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: H. Sweany
Reviews.Content: Took a while to decide to upgrade to this Kindle Fire HDX from my HD. I loved my original and love this one more. The home screen is great, like not having to scroll to find what I am looking for in my apps or books. Gave my old Kindle Fire to someone and they are now a Kindle fan.

Reviews.Title: No GPS?! Revised 3/27/2014
Reviews.Author: Sandra G. Cook
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Kindle as a Christmas gift for my spouse.  I usually do very thorough research before ordering online but I messed up on this one.  With all the hype about the HDX, I assumed it would include GPS.  My lowly ASUS has it so why wouldn't the much hyped HDX?  Otherwise, it has some nice features but I just have a hard time getting past this major shortcoming.  The video is very good, audio is better than on the ASUS but I prefer headphones to the built in speakers on any tablet.  Processing speed is pretty good but perhaps the most impressive feature is the "Mayday" live help.  I've only needed it a couple of times but when you need it, it's there and I was very impressed with the quick response time and the knowledge of the operator.Not a big deal to me but another standard feature on my ASUS Transformer that's missing here is an HDMI connection.  It does have Bluetooth. Wireless is a little stronger than the ASUS. This tablet also lacks a memory card slot and a rear facing camera, both of which are included on the ASUS Transformer.Other than the lack of GPS, the most irksome thing is that you're pretty much locked into Amazon for content.  Many things I would get for free on Google are not free or not available on Amazon. Oh, and did I mention, unless you get the more expensive 4G version, THIS UNIT DOES NOT HAVE GPS?!  GRRRR!  The ASUS GPS works without a wireless connection as long as you load your maps and select your route while connected to a network and keep the tablet powered up.  Even if you have the 4G version of the HDX, I would not assume that GPS will work without a 4G connection.  Otherwise, why would GPS only be available with 4G?Revision 3/27/14: The Bluetooth is picky about what it will pair with. Can't connect with my Samsung mobile headset. It is also extremely picky about wired headphone jacks. Some work sporadically but many don't work at all. Some only get mono even though they give me stereo with other devices (like my computer or my ASUS tablet). So far the only headset I've found that works reliably and really well is a (fairly pricey) Sony Walkman in-ear headset with headband.  I've also had my first poor experience with Mayday since I first posted my review. It took a very long time to finally be told that the tablet is not compatible with my Samsung Bluetooth headset. To sum up, I don't doubt this device is very good for reading books but that's not what I bought it for. It's pretty adequate for web browsing but lacks several features that are standard on many if not most Android tablets, many of which are less expensive. If I had it to do over I'd probably opt for the smaller (less expensive) companion to my ASUS Transformer.

Reviews.Title: great buy for anyone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Awesome holds a great charge for battery easy and simple to use anyone can use it lightweight and fun great buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: What can I say about this device. This is my 3rd one and I love this one the most, its still light weight, great to use at work or on the go. The screen quality is amazing, love the new speakers. it's a nice little upgrade for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Eandhope
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kindle Fire HDX for my 6 year old son. He loves reading, playing games and  taking video / pictures. New mayday feature comes in handy. Used the Amazon mayday customer service a few days ago and my representative was excellent.

Reviews.Title: WORTH THE UPGRADE FROM THE FIRE HD
Reviews.Author: Dan Lowe
Reviews.Content: My main reason for considering the upgrade from the HD to the HDX was web browsing. The Silk browser on the HD wasn't responsive enough. With the HDX, browsing is snappy!!! I honestly can't remember when I was so satisfied with a purchase. Great value! :-)

Reviews.Title: I love this one!
Reviews.Author: Mireille Lacomere Schild "Mireille in the woods"
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th Kindle and 2nd Kindle Fire.  The HDX is a big improvement. The quality of movie watching is wonderful.  I do not mind the small 7" format because, in return, I have a small unit that fits in my purse. I have purchased a month by month service with AT&T; which allows me to be connected on the road when WiFi is not available.  The Mayday help feature is the very best help that you can hope for.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Superior Product
Reviews.Author: John Lewis
Reviews.Content: After having a Nook, which I love, I am blown away by the quality of this product.The Kindle Fire HDX out does the Nook in display, speed, downloads, movies, streaming, content, apps, and offers more storage on the device and with the Cloud. I am happy with my Nook, but I love my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the fire
Reviews.Author: samuel kulla
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying it so far other than that screen being a little small for me I think it has terrific features. In addition I am recording this message which is a very nice feature

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Velvet's Mom
Reviews.Content: I have resisted buying an e-reader for several years.Vision problems made me finally decide to try one.Why did I wait so long? I use it every day, not just to read, but to play games, and to check email when away from home.You can teach old dogs new tricks!!

Reviews.Title: A favorite
Reviews.Author: Julie A.
Reviews.Content: We gave this to my daughter for Christmas and she loves it.  It is easy to use and compact.Does everything a mini I-pad does.

Reviews.Title: I had reservations about the" special offers"
Reviews.Author: Pat Rock
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Kindle HD with Special Offers wondering how it was going to affect the ease of opening my tablet-I have a Kindle first edition that didn't have that feature., The special offers are only on the lock screen and if you want to check something out that's advertised you can or you can just unlock the screen and you're good to go.I actually like the feature because I read quite a bit and the special offers I'm getting are for books. I use my Kindle Fire HD every day-I do not regret buying it for one minute. I'm very happy with my purchase. It is also a lot slimmer and lighter than the First Edition Kindle and the resolution of the screen is fabulous.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jean Bugbee
Reviews.Content: If you need large print, Kindle is the way to got, there are so many books avalible and the font sizes make reading possible for those of us who can no long just pick up a paper back book, and enjoy. Many families have several of them, with programs for he kids and grandkids.  Another thing I like about this product, is that it dosn't  have proprietary issues.

Reviews.Title: Blown Away!
Reviews.Author: Mark Gresock
Reviews.Content: This device is the best digital do hicky I've ever used. Thought I might miss the feeling of a book in my hands. But the convenience of this surpassed my expectations. The way it manages the battery is really superb. I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: 5 star hardware, 3 star software
Reviews.Author: Matthew Anderson "Robbin505"
Reviews.Content: From a hardware perspective this the best tablet you can get for the money.  The processor is amazingly fast and the graphics engine is top of the line.  Response times are instantaneous and I have found no lag in the OS.  I'm not sure how they do it but the sound and volume on this thing is incredible.  The keyboard has swipe built in and it works well plus I also like the ease of adding new words to the dictionary. The ability to add your own words to the dictionary is incredibly useful for customizing your Kindle Fire to be adapted to your personal way of thought and speech. If you are a member of Amazon Prime the Kindle Fire is a one stop experience for shopping, books, games, and video. The real problem is in the limited OS that Amazon has created to push its app store.  This could cause problems for people who are, like myself, used to the full access of the Google Play store which you cannot use. This also means that apps that are free on Google Play might cost you money on the Amazon store. This tablet also doesn't have flash along with all modern Android and Apple products. Flash is available on Windows tablets if that is something you need. Gaming seems to work well except for some second screen features, like Battlefield's Commander app, on my Xbox One. Second screen does allow me to use the Kindle Fire as a keyboard and mouse for the Xbox One which makes surfing the web and navigating menus much easier. Great item but has a few problems.

Reviews.Title: In love!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it! I think my husband and I misread, though, because we both thought it had a front facing camera and rear facing camera. Only a front facing camera. This makes me sad, but I can live with it! It goes everywhere with me...

Reviews.Title: Go Fire!
Reviews.Author: Hagar "Fuller C. Jones"
Reviews.Content: Works like it should. so far so good, One week of use. Just closing cover (magnetic shut off) does not stop battery drain (87% to 20% over night)..  I will charge then turn off device and monitor.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Susie
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use and it is not heavy.Battery life is good and the color is greatI received my Kindle a day earlier then the projected delivery date

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jennifer H.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought a Kindle Fire HDX 7 inch I use it everyday I love to play games on it, go on facebook, and read books. I like the Kindle more then the iPad. I like how it's small and sleek. This is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: BELINDA LUJAN
Reviews.Content: I have had a ipad mini since they came out and love it but I am also a big fan and user of amazon prime so wanted to try out the kindle to see how well they work together and so far ( only have had it a week) I am liking it! My biggest dislike is the App Store not as many but that not a huge deal. I don't think you will be disappointed if you purchase. It's great for the money!!!!

Reviews.Title: May favorite piece of technology
Reviews.Author: Alexis Riccione
Reviews.Content: I have not one single complaint about my Kindle fire HDX.  I love this and use it all the time.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEVICE AND WONDERFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: ELAINE ELLIOTT
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Kindle Fire HDX and I love love love it.It is simple to use and I don't know how I got on with out it.Having said all that, let me tell you that the MAYDAY people are without a doubt the most helpful and patient tech support folks I have ever encountered.I had a little trouble with my head phone jack.  MY OWN fault , I was not clicking in the jack firmly enough.After, a couple of attempts to help me, they sent me a new device ( arrived 2 days) and I still was the" dummy on board".They didn't give up on me and we solved my problem.I was never made to feel like I was wrong or stupid or anything but a valued customer.If you are not all that tech savvy but would like to have a tablet , don't be afraid of this little device and take comfort in the assistance that is available with it.

Reviews.Title: Took two tries
Reviews.Author: Jack Roberts
Reviews.Content: The first one malfunctioned (screen), but received replacement in a timely manner. This one works great and the wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: great iteam I can now read any where I go and on my lunch break. if I take a long bus ride it will be great

Reviews.Title: Affordable
Reviews.Author: Ricki Lynn "rickilynn"
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale around Christmas. For what it is and what it does, I'm happy with the price I paid. It was a gift for my parents and they use it all the time.I do have to say though, it's NOT very user friendly. After using an iPad and iPhone for the past couple of years, learning how to use the Kindle was kind of a challenge for me. And if I'd gotten my parents an iPad instead of this, I'm sure they'd have wayyyy less questions for me. Every time I visit them there's another "thing" they "can't get the Kindle to do" or whatever. I can figure it out, but it's just harder than it should be.

Reviews.Title: grandsons approved
Reviews.Author: pic taking granny
Reviews.Content: got this with the intention of using it myself but it turned out to be a great investment to keep the grandsons occupied

Reviews.Title: Kindle #2
Reviews.Author: Rita Baker
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle.  Newest model has many new features that I really like.  Lightweight, longer reading/battery life, menu recall items, contents page etc.  Very pleased with it.  Makes the many books I read a pure pleasure.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend!!!
Reviews.Author: Booklover8
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire. I have the Paperwhite as well but this is so much better!!  The colors are so vivid and the light weight makes it easy to read and surf!

Reviews.Title: Great reading!

Reviews.Content: My husband has macular degeneration and this was the perfect Valentine gift for him.  He can adjust the print size to his comfort and the screen brightness.  Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!

Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle!  My daughter loves to read, and I love the variety of books that are available right at our fingertips.  Zero complaints, zero issues.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Kelly G.
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire! No problems as of yet but I'm loving my Kindle and got my oldman into it to lol

Reviews.Title: This is the best
Reviews.Author: cody
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire!  It was worth every penny.  I have the first Kindle and only used it to read books.  This one is amazing.  I can play games use the internet and so much more.  It was a good price and quick ship.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's my Precious...
Reviews.Author: P. Bronecky "georgie girl"
Reviews.Content: I have wanted this for months! And when it came up on this special, I couldn't resist. It's wonderful. I take it everywhere, it's compact, very readable and I haven't found anything I can't do on it yet. My husband has his iPad, my kindle does as much as it does, for much less cost. The apps abound. My husband and I each have the third gen kindle, I bought a appetite for my sister as a gift, so I am a die-hard kindle user. I almost never touch my laptop anymore.A friend was going to get his wife an iPad for Christmas, but I talked him into an HDX for her and she loves hers too!Keep it up, Amazon, you're amaz-ing-on!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Susie Hoskinson "sushosk"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle. It is easy to use and now with the Mayday button there is help at any time. The graphics on all my games are so clear. Just love my Kindles.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: Tommy Squitieri
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is outstanding. It has exceeded my expectations. It is easy to use and has so many apps to choose from. It has improved my reading and helped me with my professional emailing.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Garris
Reviews.Content: I switched to the Kindle Fire HDX last month and I'm still trying to get used to it.  I do love that the picture is much clearer, and it is pretty easy to navigate around, but what I don't like is that there is no light indicator for charging, and charging the new Kindle seems to take much longer than charging the Kindle Fire.  Also, it would be easier if the power on and off button were on the bottom as opposed to the back.

Reviews.Title: My third Kindle and all are GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I take it with me everywhere I go as it fits easily in my purse and keeps me from getting bored while I wait. I can read, play games, check my email, etc., etc.. Definitely recommend for its lightness, and great viewing screen..

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Robert "rgus"
Reviews.Content: This is a really good multipurpose, multitasking device for home use.  Unfortunately, some one stole mine so I'll have to get another one.

Reviews.Title: Best purhase I ever made!
Reviews.Author: plainoldgolfer
Reviews.Content: I love to read and our local library had a Kindle Fire that I could check out and try.  Well I was hooked and ordered mine and use it every day.  It has many features on it besides just a reader which makes it handy to have sitting next to my chair so I can pop onto the internet or just pick it up and read anytime of the day or night.  The May Day button is great to have on the Kindle Fire HDX 7 and I have had a question or problem and used it and the tech support is great.  The only way I would part with my Kindle is to purchase another one to take its place.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Edward Hetzler
Reviews.Content: The selection of ebooks is outstanding. Everything from classics of antiquity to modern best sellers.I especially like the ability to check the dictionary and or go online and research some fact directly from the text. The x-ray feature is wonderful for those books with complicated lists of characters.The mirroring feature compliments my smart TV so that I can watch movies on demand without committing to a monthly fee.

Reviews.Title: SUPER
Reviews.Author: Donald A. Karvonen
Reviews.Content: I had another tablet previously, but it was very awkward to use.  The Kindle is intuitive.  It should be rare when I need to take a notebook on short trips anymore.  The Kindle will suffice.

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive, so many options
Reviews.Author: Bettie
Reviews.Content: This was a great and inexpensive gift! I Will definitely recommend to other people looking for a tablet on a budget.

Reviews.Title: Kindle and Amazon great
Reviews.Author: garry lyonnais
Reviews.Content: it's everything they said it wasdefinitely would recommend to a friend I bought 2 of themand my kids love them definitely cheaper then the iPad

Reviews.Title: fast
Reviews.Author: Leroy
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle, I have this tradition that every year so my birthday i get the newer version, and so far every year it just keeps getting better and faster.

Reviews.Title: It is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Cindy Jessen
Reviews.Content: I love playing games on it, I love shopping on it I'm really happy I got it at Christmas, Best gift last year

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: VaticToxic
Reviews.Content: While I wish I could access the Google play/Android app store or any other app store as well, I can understand why it isn't allowed.From a public relations and customer service standpoint:There would be so many complaints about incompatible apps coming in that they couldn't do anything about that it really is best that they aren't accessible.From a business standpoint:They likely make more money this way, of course, but adding in "partner" app stores would likely require fees that would probably increase the cost for app buyers, creators, and the app stores. Maybe even increase the cost of the device. This, in turn, would likely cause customers to become more unhappy then they are with just the current approach, and at both "store" owner companies.I wonder if I could send my current device in to "upgrade" it's storage, or 4G capability, or to remove its adds, or something else at some point in the future for less than the cost of buying a new one, but I guess that is something to ask Amazon directly or look into on my own to see if such a thing exists.Anyway, I love my KFHDX7. Works great, has a good battery life, the screens colors are wonderful. The one I bought has a good screen size. It came with a good charger. The charger is one thing I absolutely love right now. It is, essentially, a wall plug in with a USB port. I can use any USB to mini USB cord to charge it, and the cord it came with can plug into the charger or my computer with no problem. I remember getting the charger for the Gen One Kindle Fire and having to go out and buy my own USB to mini USB cord in order to transfer files manually (instead of by email) or use my computer to charge it and that was something I found relatively disappointing. I am so glad this was changed with this one.Five out of five stars!

Reviews.Title: I love the kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Heather Sikes
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle fire HDX to read I had a kindle and the fire holds more books I can also listen to music

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Meleve1
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle. Only thing that I would say is it should come with a how to book for all amenities. The little tour does not really show you how to do everything that you can do with it. I like to know all my options. Now you can look up everything and or figure it out but it takes more time to do that.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Lea jean Goulet
Reviews.Content: I just am not sure that there is a big difference from the kindle fire hd and I feel like it needs charging every few hours

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: S. Newton
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle so far. I'm "techno challenged" so it's taking me a while to learn all the bells and whistles and even some of the easy stuff, but what I am working with is great! Very crisp and clear, lightweight for easy handling. I have arthritis in my hands and fingers which make for clumsy movements, but the Kindle reads what I'm doing and responds beautifully. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: wife Loves it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Coming out of the orig Kindle Fire, my wife wasn't sure she'd like to new one as her old one was used everyday. She loves it and LOVES the new features and the added battery life. Great job  on the redesign. My daughter got the old one which is still running strong.

Reviews.Title: longer range needed
Reviews.Author: Kit Kolflat
Reviews.Content: I'd hoped that by purchasing this kindle (now my 3rd) I'd be able to use it at the far end of the house. I bought a big new BOSS modem but even that didn't help.  The display is really sharp and I like the camera mode but wished it could "turn around". So would I do it again???? not for this money, I'd have waited till they came out with a bigger and better model next year and this one dropped in price !

Reviews.Title: Usage
Reviews.Author: Jim Allmann
Reviews.Content: I found the Kindle Fire HD a handy instrument for reading books and watching movies.  The best feature is the "Mayday" option.  The people who have responded to my questions have been very friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Estrada
Reviews.Content: I could not be happier with my Kindle Fire HDX.  It is easy to use.  The graphics are out of this world.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Sara Collins
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is everything it promised.  Amazon's service has been the very best possible.I absolutely recommend this tablet to everyone!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!
Reviews.Author: NDT
Reviews.Content: I'm an avid Apple product user and not a fan of Android phone OS.  However, this product exceeds my expectations.  The color, brightness, clarity of display is just stunning.  The sound quality is also top notch.  The speed blew me away!  It moves from app to app with great speed.  I love the ability to highlight, write notes, etc. on books and PDF files.  I also like that there is a "on device" and "cloud" app storage so I can move apps to the Cloud when I don't want them for a time.  It's very light and easy to handle.  I like the swipe texting, also.  I'm not bothered by the special offers.  It's allowed me to catch some deals I may not have noticed otherwise.  It's ways to buy apps.  While the app store isn't up to par with Apple, it's been just fine so far.  There's Candy Crush, which is important, of course :) I own an iPad, too; but it's too big and heavy for me to read and use for school work.  So husband took ownership of that and I'm in love with my new Kindle.  Seriously.  Love it.  Got a Poetic magnetic cover and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet
Reviews.Author: Jabez
Reviews.Content: Good tablet overall but the thing is the appstore its has about 10x less than the apple apps in the appstore

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Barbara C.
Reviews.Content: I love it!  For the price, it is a wonderful device. I purchased it because of it's e-reading ability, access to libraries, and facebook and email. Pandora is a plus. And, even though some difficulty, I transferred my I-tunes. I have a newer Mac, and my Mac does not recognize the device. However, that is not a reason to not purchase it. The picture is wonderful and the sound is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Not as good
Reviews.Author: Linda Comstock
Reviews.Content: I loved my previous Kindle Fire.  This new one, the Kindle Fire HDX, has the worst battery life I've ever seen. I KNOW there is better batteries Amazon could use, but I supposed you want us to just buy another Kindle when our current one dies.  As you're surfing the web or playing a game you can see the percentage of battery life constantly being drained; in 20 minutes it's drained 10% or more.  Have to charge it almost every day.  I don't expect this one to last as long as my first one.  Also, when I want a book to read, I scan the titles and click on the ones that look interesting to me, but when I go back to the previous page of the list of books, it doesn't take me back to where I was and I have to start scrolling through them again starting at the first one.  I miss being able to click on the top of the screen to get to settings.  Regarding email, several times now I've forwarded an email and it comes to ME from ME instead of the person I forwarded it to, and the original one I forwarded from has disappeared.  The lousy battery life is my main complaint, however.  My husband has an iPad, and he charges it maybe once a week.  Next time I'm buying an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Convenient and dependable
Reviews.Author: JHL
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my Kindle Fire so far. It's easy to use and provides a high-quality experience for reading e-Books, browsing the Internet and watching video. It's also compact and great for taking on a business trip. I actually used it for Skyping with my family the last time I was away, and it would be worth it just for that capability alone.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet, but...
Reviews.Author: citygal "Salsera"
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet. I like the integration with Amazon Prime movies. The only thing I don't like is the keyboard. I consistently hit the menu key that's situated at the bottom of the spacebar and it continuously fouls me up. It's really frustrating. Will need to find a way to change the keyboard layout.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle Fire....
Reviews.Author: Miss-Daphne "Miss-Daphne"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle fire for the Microsoft Word Feature. I based my purchase on reading reviews from other people on this website. Overall I am pleasantly pleased with my Kindle fire I can surf the Internet at a very fast speed, and I love the free apps it came with. I did not choose the special offers package because I do not care for a lot of advertising. The apps are easy to download and so far my Kindle is very easy for me to manage.  So far I can use my Kindle for two full days and not have my battery run down. The only downside to purchasing this Kindle is the fact that I had to pay $14.95 for the Microsoft Office feature. In reference to another persons comment on here I would like to verify the truth when it comes to Microsoft Office you do need the Internet in order to download the app but you do not need it to type or use most of the basic features. I was able to type a full research paper on this Kindle for my Geography class. So in my opinion it does the job I will update in a few more months after I've had a chance to use a lot of the other features hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: KB's
Reviews.Content: Bought it for the wife and what an awesome tablet. Picture is clear, color is great. Can't keep her off it. What a great product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic tablet
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I have owned mine for about half a year now. Each day it is the first device I reach for. I read and write email, surf the web, read and listen to books and watch videos. It has replaced my iPads almost entirely. I recommend it unreservedly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer sportsman
Reviews.Content: I've never had a tablet before, and I definately chose the right one. Since getting my kindle fire hdx in December, I've read 21 books on it! I can honestly say I'm in love :)

Reviews.Title: Glad i bought it
Reviews.Author: tim mcgraw
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy it.  I do a lot of reading on it and I can travel with it and have every thing I need right there.  great little pad.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Diane Brant
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle but am still learning how to use some of the programs.  Wish I had a manual to explain some of the basics to me. The games are fun. Haven't tried to read a book yet.

Reviews.Title: Great, amazing, and I love to read
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: First of all I would recommenced this to anyone wanting to buy an e-reader. It has everything from books, to apps, and it is clear and precise on the books. The books are not to expensive, and you can download other reader apps for this product.I chose this because I didn't traditionally like to read, but with this, I can find what I want and it is either inexpensive, or free. What a joy.The best thing about the product is the price, it isn't cheap, but it isn't something that takes a fortune to buy.

Reviews.Title: My KIndle Fire
Reviews.Author: donitalouise
Reviews.Content: I debated on a Nook, a Kindle HDX, or an Acer little notebook.  Everyone had different ideas.  Of course my daughter said Ipad is the only way.  My computer guy kept telling me to get the Kindle Fire.  He knows me and all of my computers.  O got the Kindle.  Told him and he smiled.  I love it. I have an iphone and two desktop PC's and we also have a laptop.  This is for a toy JUST FOR ME.  I like the display and it is easy to operate.  Except....when I took it to the beach and opened the cover, I didn't see a way to connect to the hotel's wi fi.  My phone did and our laptop did but mind showed me a keyboard and asked for a pin????  I don't have a pin.  Never did.  Never given the choice.  So I had to come home and wipe out all of my information and start from the beginning.  I luckily didn't have a lot to replace but I am going to take it away from my wi fi signal soon and just see what happens. There must be an easy way but the woman I was speaking to was obviously from another country with perfect English but didn't exactly know how to tell me why that happened. Other than that.....I would buy one again. And recommend it too.

Reviews.Title: still figuring it out
Reviews.Author: joanne medeiros
Reviews.Content: It has its uses but it is not as handy as I thought it would be the Silk system drops pages often and once I have all my questions written down will be using mayday button a lot wish it was simpler to use no folders for bookmarks and the apps I have down loaded don't for the most part do what they say they will also does not seem to support adobe or at least that is what it tells me have not figured out how to find things in cloud that I have stored. Actually it makes me feel like I need a dummies book to work it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Connie M. Brandon "connie6005"
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle Fire HDX very well and does all I need it to do.  I am a sitter at the hospital and it works well for what I need it to do.  And with my Prime, I can do most anything and much cheaper.  I love the borrow books on it but I think the borrow books should be 2 a month instead of one.

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about this Kindle! I recently had a loooong day of traveling, which included long boring flights and layovers. My Kindle kept me from getting bored and time flew on the plane! (no pun intended) Seriously, I downloaded a bunch of free movies and I was good to go! Everyone should own a Kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jcrunk
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. So far she loves it. Its easy to use, small enough to carry around and we have had no issues with it. The screen is awesome and the resolution shows every detail. Its even easy enough for my  3y/o daughter to turn on cartoons to watch if she wants.Before I bought this I saw some people complaining about the faint blue border when viewing white screens. For us it hasn't bothered us in the least. It's so faint its hard to even tell its there unless you look for it and it hasn't been a distraction at all. My only complaint would have to do with some of the game apps my daughter uses. One of them won't let you change the volume unless you exit the game, but this could be caused by the app itself not the kindle. I would definitly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Carlin Lau
Reviews.Content: Awesome device. I love all the Kindle Fire devices including the Kindle reader. The best part about the Kindle devices is the excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: Really Enjoying This HDX
Reviews.Author: Karielk
Reviews.Content: I tried a different brand,  thinking getting away from amazon may be better,  but i found the other name brand tablet lagged going into sites like facebook and weatherbug etc.  to the point it was annoying.  i missed watching things on amazon prime,  so i took it back and got this hdx and it is awesome.  it goes into these sites immediately,  so clear and i love it.  I'll stay with kindlefire

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: melody
Reviews.Content: this was bought as a gift and the person really likes it. connects to wifi really fast and has great content

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle and enjoy the convenience, but I do not like the connection port.  The plug that goes into the Kindle is slanted and takes several tries to get it plugged in correctly.  That is why I did not give 5 stars.  The actual Kindle is great and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX!!!
Reviews.Author: Lori Majors
Reviews.Content: Got my kindle fire for Christmas. I have used it quite a bit now and would recommend it to many. I have downloaded books, browsed the internet,  do facebook, taken pictures, and downloaded a texting app.  I have done all of this with little or no difficulty considering I am not very tech savvy and do not have a cell phone. The only  negative I have about the kindle fire HDX is adobe flash player is not available for this or any newer device, but haven't really missed it that much. A lot of things from youtube will still stream, as upgrades are made.  Some videos from Facebook play while others do not, but if it is something I really want to see I look on my laptop. All in all, I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but…..
Reviews.Author: Caryn
Reviews.Content: The complaints regarding a flickering screen and the blue/purple haze around the edges that I read about before purchasing, unfortunately have also held true with the one I purchased and received….i've read four books on my kindle since purchasing and the blue haze around the edges is definitely noticeable, especially when reading in a dark room.  I don't know if it's worth returning…since its not strictly an e-reader (one can do many other things on the kindle other than read…all of which are fun, interactive and are not afflicted with the blue haze border…if it was just an e-reader and it had the blue/purple haze that would be a deal breaker) it doesn't make the book too hard to read, but its distracting, and certainly puts a strain on the eyes.  The flickering screen also creeps up from time to time when I'm playing different apps (candy crunch app is when I usually see it…all the candies flicker like someones turning a light on and off).  It lasts only a few seconds then stops…these things I think are what keep this good tablet from being a great tablet.  Amazon needs to address the issues.  Other than that, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rachel J
Reviews.Content: I got this for my father for Christmas. Best gift I could have invested in. It has similar qualities to an Ipad but for a 1/4 of the cost. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" is a Big Bang for your Buck
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: I find the Kindle HDX 7" so much better than my first version.  The features and the clarityof the display are great and the price is just right.  I love my Kindle and I always take it with me.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Wildman
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle all the time.  It is so easy  to use.  I like all the features available.  Love the books.  The screen is so easy to read

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michael E. Jennnings
Reviews.Content: Just received Kindle Fire, still getting to know it.  I love that I can read my Kindle books and search the web from one device.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Kathy L. Scholl "Katlyn100"
Reviews.Content: I've bought 6 Kindles, starting with the very first generation -- I have three Kindle Fires and love this one the best.  I got a 32GB this time because I ran out of app space on my 16GB.  I also got one for my granddaughter.  This model boots up faster than the others and is so light, even when in a case, that I hardly notice it's in my purse.  I couldn't live without it!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: LOURDES REROMA
Reviews.Content: This device is so handy.  Except for the front facing camera, this gadget is great.  I would have wanted a camera that could switch to the back.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Betty Ryan
Reviews.Content: Met all my expectations! Connects instantly to Bookstore. Downloads quickly. It is my  third and favorite Kindle!Recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Estela
Reviews.Content: it helps a lot to many things you want to do with this small gadget especially when travelling. will recommend it to relatives and friends.

Reviews.Title: I bought a 7 and a 9"
Reviews.Author: Linda Sorensen
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her 7" HDX.  Does a lot with it but also still uses her kindle for reading till her books are finished that she has downloaded.I love mine but still haven't used some of the apps I put on the 9" HDX.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX7
Reviews.Author: helen buzzell
Reviews.Content: Just love my kindle fire and really love using it especially with the book showing how to use the different chapters in My kindle fire handbook by Jim Cheshire & Jennifer Kettell.  This kindle stays on and does let me read like it should and I don't have any problems with it, only have a hard time putting it down because I love reading on it.

Reviews.Title: So much better !!
Reviews.Author: Draguinn
Reviews.Content: What can I say, It's so much better than the kindle fire that I had, which isn't too shabby in it's own right.

Reviews.Title: Best Video Display
Reviews.Author: Adam Nebraska
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX has the best display on the market today. This makes it perfect for Amazon video content.

Reviews.Title: GREAT COLOR
Reviews.Author: LONNIE GREGOR "LONNIE"
Reviews.Content: GOT THE KINDLE FOR CHRISTMAS I LOVE THE COLOR IS GREAT , FAST REALLY ENJOY THE KINDLE MAKES READING A PLEASURE.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Boxershiner
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with my new Kindle. I'd been wanting one for a while but had a lot of extra expenses last year. I finally got my budget back on track!

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: This is not just an ordinary tablet. It is so much more!!! I can connect to anything online faster on this than my cellphone or other tablet I have. It's clear and colorful! Super easy to navigate. I can store so many books on it and after I've read them, I can download them onto my computer and save for a rainy day if I want to read it again. Or, I can share back and forth with others who have the Kindle. It's a great buy and one of the best gifts I've ever received. I'll grab it before my new laptop I bought 6 months prior because it fits easily into my hand and I can take it with me on the go. Fits right in my purse or small bag. I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Mysti'sMom
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this Kindle edition! I particularly enjoy the voice recognition typing feature, although it took a bit of getting used to, having to speak punctuation!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Beverly
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. I keep my collection of books, mostly free ones, and read when I find time and want to. I carry my Kindle everywhere with me, just as I used to carry a book with me, but now I have one item with access to all books. Also can connect to internet when wireless is available. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: T. Murphy
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 9 year old daughter for Christmas... I haven't seen her since. The graphics are just unbelievable!

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: bluekidillac2
Reviews.Content: I have fallen in love with the ease and accessibility of the Kindle Fire.  Instead of managing so.many separate devices now I.can pretty much do it all with one.  Still learning about a few things but loving it so far.  Suggestion?  No user manual? Really!?!  There is so much functionality you miss out on it you don't know all that it can do.  Some people just read books with it cause that's what they bought it for and don't experiment with apps or mirroring etc.  Not everyone is all that intrepid and not everything about advancing technologies is intuitive for.everyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7
Reviews.Author: Pennsylvania Joy
Reviews.Content: At first, I thought there was something wrong with it because the battery drained so quickly, unlike my Kindle Fire HD8.9.  Then I adjusted the settings on the device that was draining the battery and it works perfectly now.

Reviews.Title: good for school
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Im a college student and I get all my books on my kindle it helps so I dont have to carry them around all day

Reviews.Title: Add $15 to disable special offers
Reviews.Author: It's Chowdah
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is a great unit.  We use it a lot and love it.  I prefer the size over the larger ipad2.Add $15 to the price to disable the "special offers".

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", 32, HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Julia B. Bowman
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX 7", 32GB, as a gift for Christmas, and it is one of the best gifts I could have received. I am 70 years old and just love it and use it every day mostly for reading and games, etc.  I love the colors it displays, the key board, the camera takes excellent pictures, the battery life is really good, and the size is perfect for my purse.  Thank you Amazon for the Kindle Fire.  Julia Bowman

Reviews.Title: A Family of Kindle Users
Reviews.Author: james perreault
Reviews.Content: We are a family of Kindle users and we all love them.  Ages range from 75 years. to 9 1/2 years.  My daughter, a professional, even uses hers (a gift from me) to do some of her work when away from the office.  Books, games, the web, email, etc. all used by the four of us on our Kindles.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: J. Tweeten
Reviews.Content: I updated from a Kindle Touch reader to the Kindle Fire HDX 7" and I just love it! The only complaint I would have is that the battery doesn't last long enough but I had read that complaint in other reviews before purchasing the item so I was aware of it. I just make sure I take my power cord with me if I feel I will be using my Kindle Fire long enough to run out of battery. I use mine for reading books, searching the web and playing games. Great smaller tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Roger McKee
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it keeps her from having to go to computer everytime she wants something and also loves playing games on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Rebecca L Hope
Reviews.Content: I really love my kindle fire hdx 7.  It works great. Great size too. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: mystery reader
Reviews.Content: It makes purchasing books sooooooo easy.  Only had it about two weeks and already I have read about 8 books.  Only negative is that it should have had a two way camera

Reviews.Title: Just perfect
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Wright
Reviews.Content: Great value, lot of applications, fast the size is perfect for me, long battery life......my best gift to myself all year

Reviews.Title: works smoothly
Reviews.Author: rene lafontaine
Reviews.Content: this is our families third Kindle and the Best . It is so seamless and the picture is really exactly as nice as they say . I stayed with the smaller size and I was right in doing so very easy in carrying around or in the purse .

Reviews.Title: Would beat all competitors if the app store was up to snuff!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire HDX would EASILY beat Apple and Android if it had a better app store. I love my kindle, but am frustrated by the lack of apps available for use. I'm in college and would greatly benefit from the blackboard app and other apps like it. It seems like every time I search for an app, it's not available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Zak
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" has met all my expectations.  It was a gift for my grandson who loves it.  Easy to use.  No problems downloading any games.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Kate B
Reviews.Content: It works great, and with the Amazon prime account there are a ton of movies and tv shows for free. The set up was easy, just had to put in my WiFi info. I wish it can with a quick list of hint and features, but all the basic stuff you can figure out easily

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: andres tellez
Reviews.Content: Excellent screen quality, fast processor, good size,  More than I expected!!! I Love my Kindle Fire HDX! I've never thought it was a device extremely competitive with the ipad.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Carol Taylor
Reviews.Content: I REALLY LIKE MY KINDLE!  I MUCH PREFER READING EBOOKS TO REGULAR BOOKS.THE BATTTERY LIFE SEEMS TO BE EXCEPTIONAL.THE ONLY THING I FIND TO BE A PROBLEM IS THAT THE CALENDAR DOESN'T WORK, AND THAT IS ONE OF THE FUNCTIONS I COULD REALLTY USE!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jeanette
Reviews.Content: The graphics on the Kindle Fire HDX are incredible.  I am very happy with my purchase and recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: My Great Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: D. Bowen
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my new Kindle !!!  it is so different then my 2 other Kindle. It is very easy to use because of all the help screens. I don't even have to use my stylus because it is so sensitive to touch. I haven't found anything to change, yet.I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: REALLY GREAT TABLET
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet has everything I need.  I had been using both an ipad and a Nexus but I find the kindle to be just as good.  It has everything I wanted in a tablet and more,

Reviews.Title: Great device to use with all your Amazon digital purchases
Reviews.Author: Jay G.
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle device and my second Kindle Fire (first one was the 1st gen KF). I have to say I love it. My wife was able to try out the 8.9" KF HDX and while the movies were beautiful on it the size was not for me since I read a lot, so I got the 7"Screen = sexySound = It's a mobile device so I dont expect anything spectacular, that is where ear buds or headphones come into playCPU = Speedy little thing, quite impressedBuild Quality = SolidBattery Life = Great but like everyone else I want longer! :)Storage = 64GB and am happy Amazon offers this size and would love to see a 128GB or 256GB model in the future.OS = meh...... Read about it below.Bluetooth = WinWiFi = stable and solid I am an Android user and I like stock Android. I understand Amazon is trying to make it usable for anyone of any age sort of deal, but my biggest gripe is the freaking carousel (please fire the person/s responsible for this decision!!!) Please make a way to customize or just flat our disable for your customers that cant stand it. Second is the silk browser... I mean really come on! Why not use the default browser or Chrome that is part of Android, they are decent and average browsers that dont have issues with 60% of websites when loading them or hanging on the other 40% at random times. I just use Firefox Mobile to resolve this issue. Third and this is more of a personal issue that pops up from time to time since I got the Kindle Fire HDX and that is the seemingly constant need to be connected to the internet. When I am at home not a problem, when I am on the road really not a problem as I can use a hotspot (but do I really need to?), when I am at work that is really impossible as I have to keep it in airplane mode if I want to even bring it with me. This poses an issue sometimes when it needs to verify licensing to run some apps or play some games during lunch or waiting for code to compile, to watch a movie I downloaded from Amazon VOD so I could watch it while away from a data connection or a limited data connection in terms of data amount I can use. This needs to be resolved with all digital content that is usable on the KF HDX. I dont really have this issue when I use my Nexus 7 unless the app/game I am trying to run requires an internet connection for it to actually function due to the nature of the app/game.OK now that I got my negative out of the way lets add a few more good things to this rating.The app/game selection is pretty darn good, the game circle is cool but Amazon and Google need to make a love connection here with games that support G+ syncing so I can keep my saves of Reaper on my Android devices and KF HDX device. Don't think I need to play two separate games due to that (or at least make a way to export/import gave saves between the platforms). Digital content in terms of movies/shows and also music is great. I buy 99% of my content from Amazon as I can play the music on any platform and then stream video content to any platform. Then with the purchase of BR/DVD/Digital from the store if I cant add it to my Amazon digital library, then the support of flixster and such is available.I love reading books on this device, I have a ton of book I have purchased through Amazon and then ones I have as PDF from technical books I can send using the kindle address or side loading it. The good reads inclusion of the app is not as robust as the Android version or the website but it will do and it does let you see some other books based off of comments, ratings, and similar interest when you are looking for something a little outside your normal scope.Hope this helps other customers!

Reviews.Title: A Got To Get
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Klohr
Reviews.Content: When I wanted the HDX, I thought I would get the 8.9 display. But then I thought how much I love my Fire, the fact it is true that it fits in my hand so well! The ease of my ability to do this became the focal point in my decision to stay with the 7"I got it on Friday, and how much do I love it?  It is lighter, has a better picture, and more ease of use than I thought it would be.  I am so happy I got this one, I truly love it..And my Fire, well my son started it up with his own account and is using it.

Reviews.Title: No Flash player available
Reviews.Author: Beachmom
Reviews.Content: It's a good tablet but unlike it's predecessor the Kindle Fire you can't play certain videos that require a flash player and they don't offer the possibility to get flash player. Not real pleased with that after UPGRADING to the better HDX display. On my old Kindle I can watch videos with flash player . If you need the flash player this ISN'T the product for you.  Disapointed......

Reviews.Title: Better than the kindle fire HD
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire hdx 7" is neater than the other kindle fires. It fits neatly in any bag I carry so I can access it at any time. It responds to commands faster than the previous generations and the sound is better. The battery life leaves a little to be desired especially when surfing the net or playing games. I would recommend the kindle fire hdx to anybody.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Maria Gladfelter
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 7" is fabulous! It does everything and then some. Great display, great sound and fast connect to wifi.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: We have wanted an tablet that can get on the internet, save our books, play games but did not want to spend the money on other products.  The price on the Kindle Fire HDX is well worth it and it saves you money by giving you the same thing that an IPAD gives you at a lower price.  Would definitely recommend this product for all ages.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: MJ Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I chose this kindle because I thought the price was right.  Immediately I realized there was no way I could take pictures with the camera.  You do not see the object you are trying to snap because it has only a front camera and you only see yourself.

Reviews.Title: It is exactly want I wanted in a tablet.  Mainly reading, games, email, go online, etc. No need for "work" related apps, etc.
Reviews.Author: Anita Brennan "needer"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is light weight, the color screen is beautiful.  Easy to move around apps, books, games.  I can't say enough how happy I am with it.  I bought the one with special offers and I love seeing what is on special for the day when starting up.  That is the only time offers appear.

Reviews.Title: I can't breathe without my kindle.
Reviews.Author: Jessica Dean "Mrs. Dean"
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle so much. I have the first kindle fire and its great but this one knocks it out of the park. Its lighter, glad I can actually lay it on my chest to read it without turning it off. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great display, but bad display
Reviews.Author: David Frei
Reviews.Content: I got an hdx 7 for christmas, and was excited by the specs.  The screen is brilliant and beautiful, except for a few features which are not so pleasant.The purple/blue bleed people talk about, its real.  It is annoying and distorting.  I only read books in night mode, where the background is black, so the blue doesn't show up.The second issue is that in a large number of non-native apps, the screen flickers.  Sometimes it is just a little bit, once in a while, but in some apps, it can get to the point where it is so consistent that it gives an almost instant headache and makes the app unusable for more than a couple minutes.  I did find, however, that just hitting the power button and then turning it right back on again (so that the screen turns off but not the kindle itself) can temporarily get rid of, or at least greatly reduce, the flicker.Honestly, the display issues really make it feel like a cheap tablet.  Which is disappointing.  My wife has a first generation nexus 7 and I wish I'd gone for a second gen of that instead of the HDX.  We've found no issues with that tablet in the year-and-a-half she's been using it.A big upside is the ability to download free prime movies and tv shows (the downloadable ones are a much smaller subset of the free prime videos, but as someone who watches little tv, there's plenty there that I've never seen that will last me for a long time) which means having the ability to watch movies on the plane, in the airport, or in the train without internet.In all, the kindle is a good entertainment device for videos, but the screen issues mean it falls short of expectations in other areas, including reading and writing, which I'd expected to use my kindle for quite a bit.  I've got it now, and I'm finding ways to use it, but I wish I had a better product instead.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Ever!

Reviews.Content: My daughter 13) loves it!  She likes to read and it is small enough that she can take it with her. Screen quality is also very clean and clear.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: DILIA M. BAEZ
Reviews.Content: It is so different then mi iPad mini. Graphic are a lot better. I recommend this instead of the iPad .

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: KJG72
Reviews.Content: My 11 year old son loves it! I probably should have gone with the 8" but we a happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: love it!!

Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX! It the perfect size, lightening fast and easy to operate. I would recommend this to anyone! One thing I hate is that I don't have the smart tv to have the screen mirroring. That is an awesome feature!

Reviews.Author: Connie S. Gray
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, it is easy to use and has great graphics.The only issue I have is the front facing camera, a total waste.  It would be better if it were rear facing, then you wouldn't have to struggle to stay out of the picture.But, everything else about the Fire HDX, I absolutely love.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Oh Yea!
Reviews.Author: barefoot
Reviews.Content: I was hard pressed to give up my new kindle fire 7" hdx, certainly because it was a christmas gift from my wife. But I found out a few things about my phone provider when they wanted me to exchange my kindle fire for their tablet. Not only was i being scammed But was informed later... and was able to get out of it before the very short dead line contract expired. I'm glad very glad in fact that I didn't give up my Kindle Fire or return it. It's very fast and it's all I need. Glad I didn't screw up there. I really like this tablet it's my 1st been following this for awhile and when during christmas if you was a store card holder you could by this shipping free for 179.00 what a deal! wow! no regrets here.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my uses-The Kindle Fire has reinvented its best with the HDX
Reviews.Author: Swtbear13
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle fire for about a year and a half. I loved it but needed more memory quickly enough. When I saw the new HDX had 64 gb available it had my attention but I was skeptical about how different they could possibly be.Well I am here to tell you that the quality has greatly improved. Also the HDX is considerably lighter- so much so that when I put the HDX into a case with a wireless bluetooth keyboard included it was still lighter than my original HD.The sound quality is what I expected and I havent tested the range of the wifi but as of now I have never had a problem with connecting with a wifi signal.Battery life is as advertised and works well for me because I take my HDX to class and type notes for my courses with it.Overall I am thrilled with this product and everyday I try to find new ways to use it!

Reviews.Author: Vnyrdstar
Reviews.Content: All I can say, is I ended up buying TWO the 7" for my son and then the 8"9 for myself. I know people who have Ipads but why pay more for pretty much the same thing. Reviews.Title: Still loving it

Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle as a Christmas gift for myself and I have yet to put it down. It's like my cellphone and keys, I take it everywhere, gym, work, out visiting family and friends,

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a great price
Reviews.Author: CMcInnes

Reviews.Title: nice

Reviews.Title: Its fantastic

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is Great!
Reviews.Author: Joan Kerrigan
Reviews.Content: I just love my Kindle Fire! I used to have a Kindle that came out earlier, and I really liked it. But the Kindle Fire has so many more programs to enjoy. I like to read, but sometimes I need a change from reading. Kindle Fire gives me the choice of other activities. Thanks to whoever made the Kindle Fire, and to Amazon for putting it out.

Reviews.Title: So Much More than an E-Reader!
Reviews.Author: K. Normand
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 7" with 32GB as a replacement for my old Kindle, which had made its way into my son's bedroom, never to reappear (he is an avid reader). I did a LOT of research before I made my purchase and decided that this Kindle was the best fit for me. I was not disappointed!There are a few drawbacks:1. No SD card slot so on-board memory is all you get. This isn't a problem for me, since I don't have a whole lot of apps and cloud storage is available. (LOVE the cloud storage!!)2. Google apps are not supported. Reportedly people have gotten them to work on their Kindle but I wasn't able to get them going. I adapted - I get my Gmail via browser and use an alternate mapping app.3. Battery life isn't quite what I'd like, but manageable.Now for the pros:1. The size and weight is just right. It is comfortable to use - even hours on end like I do2. Clear, sharp images. I was quite impressed by how good things look on the Kindle Fire3. Cloud storage so if you get overloaded with apps or books, you can save them to the cloud for later retrieval4. A wide variety of apps will run on the Kindle Fire, ranging from games to Office apps.Once I got the Kindle Fire, I realized that I'd underestimated how much I'd use it. I not only use it for reading (which I do a lot!), but I also have Skype on it, several games, and a bunch of work-related applications. I use it to do some work-related tasks when it's not convenient to be at my computer. With the apps I've collected, I can do all of my work - even work that requires VPN -  on the Kindle - it's that good!I'll admit that the Kindle Fire is not for everyone. If you are expecting a full-blown tablet, you may not like this. It's total overkill if all you want to do is read books. If you absolutely MUST have the SD card slot or MUST run Google apps, then you should look elsewhere. However, if you are looking to read books and also watch movies or tv, play a few games, and run a few apps, then the Kindle Fire is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Content: Just got it today and I love it! This is my first tablet and I definitely made the right choice! It's super smooth and fast. Looks great. Reviews.Content: I got this as a xmas gift.  I was disapointed that it has a front facing camera instead of a rear facing camera.  All I can take pictures of is whoever is holding the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Content: I love the clarity of the pictures!  Reading with my Kindle Fire HDX is truly a wonderful experience.  I can even read easily in the dark, so there is no need to turn on the lights when I want to read at night.

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas. I waited until now to wright the review so I could judge it for my self. So far I have only had it in my hands once and briefly.  It is awesome. Don't waist your money on an Ipad.

The screens seems the same, the apps are the same, and the only thing we can notice different is the camera.  The HD would probably be the better deal being the price is much lower for virtually the same product.  My other complaint would be with the Prime shipping.  It took a week longer to receive than what Prime promised. Reviews.Title: Stunning Display On a Quality Product
Reviews.Author: MTCUBED66
Reviews.Content: I have been using another brand tablet for about a year. I decided, because of battery issues with the old tablet, to buy a new one. I did quite a bit of research and decided on the Kindle Fire HDX. Boy am I glad I did! The quality of graphics is superb. My old tablet looks like crap after seeing the quality of this Kindle. It is very "user friendly". I thought I might need to buy a book to help me figure it out, but it is pretty straightforward and there is a help function built in. It is sooooo faaaaaast!!!! I am loading apps in 1 second compared to 10 or 15 seconds. I guess that is the difference between the dual core and quad core. I already had most of my apps from the Amazon App Store, so that was a bonus. This tablet comes pre-installed with the Amazon App Store (which gives away one free app of the day FAOTD every day). Transferring to the new tablet was almost seamless. You have the option at setup to become an Amazon Prime member, which would be good if you like to watch TV episodes or movies (one free month, then pay). Amazon Customer Service is fantastic too!! Maybe some of the people that complain about it would complain about anything, no matter what! I found Amazon Customer Service knowledgeable, kind, FAST with helping. All around, a very good investment. This is a good quality product. By the way, the accessories offered for this tablet are fantastic too!

Reviews.Title: My friend is a happy camper!

Reviews.Content: I gave it to a 75 year old friend as a gift, and he can't put his new Kindle Fire HD 7" down. I never thought I'd give up the touch and feel of a real book, but I'm here to tell you, my Kindle library is bursting at the seams with good books to enjoy at my leisure. I, too, am a happy camper!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Content: Love it, just wish I had ordered the bigger screen.  But, love watching movies, color is excellent, clear picture. Sound is great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Dolphinlady695
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift for Christmas and am on my second one as the first one froze up on me completely after 5 days of use after I installed a puzzle game. I enjoy all the features it has to offer with two exceptions. The first downside is that you can only use Amazon apps and cannot download any games or programs that require flash player as they are not compatible with the device and flash player cannot be installed on Kindle Fire. Secondly, the camera is a big disappointment unless you do nothing but selfies as it does not have a back camera. On the upside it is easy to navigate, the screen colors are very vivid and Amazon does offer a lot of apps, some I just find useless or don't want to install. The Mayday is also a great feature unless your device is completely frozen. Certain games that are currently the rage are available but they are not the same version as the Android, Apple or desktop versions. I would recommend the Kindle for anyone who is an avid reader and doesn't want/need Google Playstore apps as they are not compatible with this device.

Reviews.Content: I really like me Kindle Fire its easy to use and take everywhere, the only thing that drives me nuts is trying to take a picture. What were you thinking, have you tried taking a pic of the sunset over the ocean and if so how did it turn out for you. Its very awkward.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Travis L. Spencer
Reviews.Content: We own a Nexus 7, which is nice device, but this one beats it.  I am really glad we bought it!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, even after a few months
Reviews.Author: Amaris W
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet where I have lots of fun while being able to read any book I choose and immediately purchase.  The Kindle Fire HDX is the perfect device for me. The screen is clear, the device is beautiful, the device is light, and the processing is super fast. Purchasing my Kindle was a perfect holiday treat because I had time to read and play games. The Kindle fire HDX made traveling home for Christmas so much fun (the free TV viewing did not work on my device while on the plane, which was problematic. But I read, listened to music, and played angry birds).The amount of time I now use my laptop has dropped down to only 25%, because this device has everything I need leisure-wise, especially for emails and Facebook. In fact, I prefer to deal with my emails only on my Kindle device. I only go to my laptop if I need to type documents or prepare documents for school and work.The Kindle is great too because it has a voice dictation software already installed which cuts my typing down significantly. This feature is important because with my physical disability, typing can be difficult on any device.I really enjoy this device, and I am glad I got it, instead of an iPad.

Reviews.Author: John T. Zipple "CMU Prof"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife. She has struggled with the learning curve because there were no instructions that came with the tablet. She likes the instantaneous online support and is amazed at the resolution of the screen and the capacity of the tablet (32GB). She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Better than the original
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: I purchased my HDX 7" only because my original was stolen. With the new version I didn't know what I was missing. I like having the additional storage of 64GB and the Bluetooth. I did like the heaviness of the original but the slimness is the HDX 7" is sleek. I did get a case and a screen protector because I prefer to protect my investments. I ave it a few months now and the any glitches resemble that of a smartphone so any trouble shooting is resolved but powering off (pressing down for 20 seconds) , waiting 45 seconds and then powering on. So far the device has froze (no response to screen at all) and there was an issue with the volume not responding and no sound came from the device from any option such as music or video. At first I felt like a sell out but getting the HDX 7" w/ Special Offers but I was on a budget and there was a sale. So far the adds don't bother me and I'm have not been offended by any of them. Overall this is a great device and always my first choice for an e-reader/tablet.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Darrell McCarroll
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is an excellent tablet, but it isn't perfect.Pros:Outstanding displayFast processorGreat priceGreat supportAmazon prime videosCons:No GPS or CompassAmazon's ecosystem simply does not have many of the apps I use on other Android devices.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"

Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  Now, I wish I had purchased the larger one.  Was a bit disappointed that I don't have the front and back camera.  I believe that it would be a lot easier to take pictures.  I have a new great-grandbaby and am always taking pictures and I think it would be better if I had gone the distance and gotten the next size.  But all and all I do love this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product for the Price

Reviews.Content: it is fun and better than the original kindle l love it so much. I think it is a great gift to give to someone

Reviews.Title: Love this gift

Reviews.Content: Great  apps, super clear image,  sound loud enough, extremely user-friendly. Best gift for years. I hear it was very affordable.

Reviews.Title: Like most, I LOVE my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: RADIOCITY
Reviews.Content: I would tend to give it 4 & 1/2 stars, but there's no half star.  First, it IS a fantastic device.  Incredibly versatile, lightweight, with an amazing screen.  I have always had (it's probably me) trouble using Apple products, as for me, they simply aren't as intuitive as others, and I don't like I-Tunes, so the HDX was a logical choice.  It is very reasonable in cost, and for those who need it, the Mayday feature is sure to be a big hit.  I've used it two times, (could have easily found the answer to my question myself, but wanted to give it a try) and the help Amazon gives IS all it's cracked up to be.  Very convenient. This device is super fast, and dependable.  I won't carry a cell phone, but with this, you can load on a free app from MagicJack, and you're good to go!  Free phone calls are always great, right?  So, why not five stars? As with most tablets, there are the occasional hang-ups while online, mostly while trying to view a video, say from Yahoo.  Can be frustrating if you're not ready to just let it go.....just don't need to see it that badly.  It can lock up the device.  Some videos DO work, but not all. Not a biggie though, just disconnect, get back on, and move on.  Hey, this can happen on my laptop, and who amongst us hasn't experienced that?  This aside, this thing is so easy to use, if you can work your laptop, or desktop, you won't have to learn a thing......no jumping through hoops like I-Tunes to load music......just drag and drop it from your laptop, and voila! Very intuitive. I bought, and suggest the 32gig model, just to be certain you'll have plenty of memory, as you cannot upgrade the memory.  The sound from the built in speakers is nothing short of amazing, and of course through the headphone jack as well.  Maybe I should have given it FIVE stars.  One last thing......I almost was set to pay for the 'NO OFFERS' (which you can also do at a later time if you don't do it when you first buy the Kindle) but was glad I didn't. The offers are GREAT, the screens shots are brilliant, and you find yourself looking forward to them when you power up. In addition, a simple millisecond swipe of your finger, and they're gone, and you're ready to go.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: free urban fictiin
Reviews.Author: Paula forney
Reviews.Content: I  love  it  I have  had  three  eye  surgerys  the  kindle  help  me  do  what  i  love  is  to  read  I  can  blow  up  the  font  and  i  see  the  books  much  better  thank  you

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: David W. Schreiber
Reviews.Content: This is our fourth Kindle and the best one yet! We could not be happier. Works perfectly. If you are looking for a tablet/e-reader think seriously about this Kindle.

Reviews.Content: we bought this for our 9 yo son for xmas. he loves it and started using it himself right out of the box. great screen. no issues. one thing i will advise others on- phone chargers with the same plug will probably not charge the kindle. it really requires its own charger that it comes with. charges quickly too. hope this helps.

Reviews.Content: love my kindle and treasure it.  So handy to use for a lot of things.  definitely better than an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: I.Thornlimb
Reviews.Content: Excited to see all this Kindle can do, I slowly am learning and really appreciate Mayday, it is great! I enjoy buying books, games, etc. from Amazon and receiving them immediately, thank you Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price

Reviews.Content: Good:  Great display and colors. Good sound. Easy navigation.Not so good:  No access to google play apps.  No rear camera

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amy M.
Reviews.Content: This is my very first Kindle and I love it!  The screen is so unbelievably clear.  Super easy to use.  Definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: My KIndle
Reviews.Author: Diane O'Neill
Reviews.Content: I especially like the May Day Lady. It was easy to set up.I dont like that I cant have a flash player for video gamesThis version was a little expensive but it comes with adverts.that you can not removeAlso, I would have liked to be able to personalize my wall paper etc.All in all, I am happy with it.I also bought the Office Max kit that "sets it up and down loads everything you need"I took it back. Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Seretha Busbee
Reviews.Content: Just perfect size for home or travel.  Wish that I had purchased it sooner.  I have recommended this Kindle to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer

Reviews.Title: oh so happy.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Joan Denman
Reviews.Content: Very pleased!  Works great for what I need. And the Mayday support is beyond perfect. love it. Never have had any problems buying anything from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Sharon Mendenhall
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire.  My daughter gave it to me for Christmas.  I have downloaded any books yet, but plan to in the future.  I love the soft touch.

Reviews.Title: Does what it suppose to do !!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Corbett
Reviews.Content: Now all you people saying it doesn't do this or that, well it's not suppose to.So for what it was designed to do, it does very well.I read lots of book using Prime, just hope they don't raise the cost of it.I watched movies without an issue, through Amazon, Netflix, Hulu+, ect... no issues there. Reviews.Title: Fire HDX 7

Reviews.Title: Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: I love this device
