Reviews.Title: The world in your hands.
Reviews.Author: GPF "guitran"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at tablets for several years, and already own the Kindle reader (which I enjoy for the convenience of reading and some games).  The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" was  a Christmas present to myself, and it was a great price to boot.  I found the setup to be ridiculously simple (already having an amazon account and another kindle), but I think that even first time owners will be pleased.  The videos on HD are very crisp (using a high speed router and Xfinity), and optional "Amazon Prime" for $79 a year provides the owner not only with free 2 day shipping on all "Prime" items purchased, but thousands of movies and shows are included.  There are a good number of "apps" available (many are free), and hundreds of free games.  For the price, this tablet certainly provides a quality interface with the internet and is more convenient that sitting at a desk or carrying a laptop.  I have also found many books and guides (borrow from Prime or purchase) that will help users to get the most out of their Kindle.  If you love videos or reading, playing games, "Skyping", or even phone calls (yes, there is a way to do that), I believe that you love this tablet.  Your only decision is whether to spend more for the "HDX" version, which adds capacity and speed, or for additional memory.  I am not a huge picture or video collector, so the 16 Gigabyte HD is perfect.  It is also a beautiful thing to look at.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product
Reviews.Author: Denise DeLamarter
Reviews.Content: I really like my husband's new Kindle.  My daughter and I both have older models.  We loved ours, until we saw the new one!

Reviews.Title: Excellent sound!
Reviews.Author: Leslie R Cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for someone who has never owned a tablet and isn't particularly computer savvy.  The OS is easy to navigate, and I love that there is live help just a button away.  The display is also gorgeous and sharp.  But what really surprised me was the sound quality!  I love watching movies and tv shows on my iPad, but if I'm doing anything other than sitting down and watching, the sound is inadequate without some auxiliary speaker.  The first movie I turned on with the Kindle Fire HDX was plenty loud enough to walk away, with a really great tone - rich, not tinny.  I also love the size - it's definitely a strong competitor for the iPad mini.I love my iPad because I'm a student and the apps there just integrate well for me, but if I wanted a top notch entertainment device, I would definitely get this again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sara Morton
Reviews.Content: Great device for fun, productivity, skype, you name it.  Have been using it constantly since I received it.  Will nullify my need for the iPad anymore.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: cocobean
Reviews.Content: got this as a gift for my mother and she just loves it, she had the kindle fire but I wanted to upgrade it for her.  She uses it every day for reading and playing games .It is thinner than the kindle fire and easier for her to keep in her hands, she js very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Wow!!! I use it 20 times a day, minimum.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great for screening out junk emails. Watch video (Amazon Prime) every day. Read books and play games.It doesn't do everything a laptop will but all the simple things it can do, and do well.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: William T Cagle
Reviews.Content: This tablet is excellent for the money. Has the Apple Air beat hands down in display, weight and price, just like the tv commercials. I have been using this since the 25th and the only complaint I have is my own doing, I should have gone for the 8.9" size. I also have the original Fire and when I registered this one, all my contents from the old one was already on the new one. Very convenient. I have not used the new Mayday feature or bluetooth function, so I can't comment on that. The browser and speed downloads are as advertised, fast! Overall very pleased. Great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it, Love it!
Reviews.Author: PATRICIA J. ROSSITER
Reviews.Content: What can I say, I love my Kindle and use it all the time. I wish I had gotten the larger memory version,but oh, well, I will just not download so much to the unit, but keep it in the Cloud. Great sound, just loud enough and great visual clarity!!

Reviews.Title: i love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I use this as a reader and for general internet browsing and social networking. The picture is Crystal clear, incredibly fast processing and download speeds, and I am 100% in love with mayday.It does all of what I need and with 64 gigs I can have my tv shows and  music readily available whenever I want, like my 45 minute train ride to work. (Phenomenal battery life as well)

Reviews.Title: For the price great little unit
Reviews.Author: Dr. Oceanfront "Oceanfront"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this unit is a steal especially when compared to other units out there.I got this as a gift for a 14 year old friends daughter and she just loves it!  She uses it everyday, and after seeing the screens and quality, I wondered why I was thinking of buying myself a $700 ipad!If everything I owned was not Apple, I might have bought this little unit.  It also looks very slick and I love Amazon service.Great bang for your buck!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: teresakay
Reviews.Content: I searched for the perfect tablet and this Kindle fire HDX is the best.  It has everything that you will ever need with a great price.  Very lightweight and the mayday is awesome.  If you have any questions you just select the mayday button and a representative comes on live chat with you to help.  Pretty awesome.....

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy for our daughters
Reviews.Author: orchid1417
Reviews.Content: Our 3 daughters are thrilled with their kindle fire HDX's. Easy to navigate, add apps, movies, music and books.  Usually when it gets quite in the house trouble is brewing, but now they are playing educational games and reading books galore!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: AARON
Reviews.Content: My kids have not put these down since Christmas morning Lol. I am so glad I took back the other tablets that I got before these. I have two boys and did not want to spend 500 dollars on tablets this Christmas and so I bought some less expensive tablets but after playing a few games on them(cause you know its the Dads duty to try out all games for his kids) I was not impressed with the quality of the screens. So when Amazon had a sale on these hdx tablets I knew I had to splurge a little and picked up two for my boys. Now I can say Father tested and kids approved. They truly have the most amazing screens and they are so fast, games load quickly. Now the bad news or so I thought, you can not expand the memory no sd slot boo Amazon Boo, Actually its not that big of a deal cause you just keep the other hundred or so games LOL on the cloud and swapping out the games takes no time. Now yo have unlimited space cause they let you keep all the games in the cloud for FREE! I also like the parental controls the tablet has built in even if you do not want to pay for the optional kid time subscription.

Reviews.Title: Good for the living room
Reviews.Author: Jacob Wilson
Reviews.Content: The bad:There is a a purple haze on the edges of the screen that makes reading web page's difficult.No expandable memory is frustrating and a move straight out of the Apple playbookThe good:Easy access to all my Amazon content (as long as your connected to the internet)Screen quality is great (minus the purple back light bleeding)The user interface is simple and stableThe kindle fire is very cloud dependant. If you only need it where you have WiFi then go for it. If you need an android tablet with more memory for offline content I would look else where.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Barbara Beaver "Pug Lover"
Reviews.Content: I just got this for Christmas and love it.  I have been using the very first Kindle made and liked that too but of course, wanted the touch screen.  I asked for the paperwhite but got this from Santa.  I'm not sorry.

Reviews.Title: so far, so good
Reviews.Author: Danny Johnson
Reviews.Content: I like ot read and play games. I'm very happy with it, and I am so glad it includes the "may day" button. Makes learning every thing it has to offer much easier

Reviews.Title: why i like it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like.the kindle because it.a lot easier to.use.then a lot of other thing I.have uses in the.past. it's and amazing device

Reviews.Title: help line
Reviews.Author: Feraidoon Ashna
Reviews.Content: click a button and help will be there too fast .. they can not see you but you can see them live and they are able to move and point your screen for you..

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Tablet!!!!
Reviews.Author: Clifford Rieman
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet!!My Mom has the Ipad, and the kid's always look forward to supervised play sessions, so we thought about getting an Ipad, but we didn't want to have to worry all the time about it falling or breaking somehow. We decided to try the Kindle,and we couldn't be happier with it. It is very fast and it doesn't lock up at all,and the kid's haven't asked to go to grandmas. I guess that's the only downfall with this product.

Reviews.Title: kindle number 2
Reviews.Author: munch
Reviews.Content: love all the extras! Wish I would have ordered larger screen. The HD is a great feature to have. Didn't realize the difference would be as good as it is from first kindle

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: Myra P.
Reviews.Content: Love being able to read in the dark, watch movies with the best resolution I've seen. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Bretney
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle. I'm having difficulty adjusting to it though because I'm used to apple products. Other than that, everything is perfect. :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: linda p.
Reviews.Content: I chose this because my younger niece told me to get it and the price was right. I wanted it for when I was away from home. It is small enough to put in my purse and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Tablet They've ever Made!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with the lightness of the tablet. Something that has been bugging ever since the first one was made. That's no longer a problem.  The display is top-notch!  You don't usually say that about a Kindle tablet...you can now.  The mayday feature is just bananas! So cool! The only thing that's really hindering this tablet (besides the lack of apps but that will come) is the email function. If they can't get some type of integration with Gmail then they need to just set up their own email service.  Cuz right now, it still looks bad in comparison to having the gmail functionality.  That's why they get 4 stars instead of 5.

Reviews.Title: Excellent small tablet
Reviews.Author: janice399 "JM"
Reviews.Content: It's small & light which works good for my walks. Everything about it is fast, the sound is good, and the display is vivid.I did have trouble downloading but was solved by properly registering the device.  Now there is no problem with it in anyway.

Reviews.Title: Good audio, nice size, good display, MiraCast issues?
Reviews.Author: traveler "traveler"
Reviews.Content: Good audio and display. I can listen to music while reading my docs and books. I mostly load my own music rather than using Amazon since I like pristine raw audio rather than mp3s. Sometimes I view video so I chose this instead of a paper white.Not enough applications on Amazon store however there is at least one good audio and office application. There are some reasonably good chess applications.The Kindle HDX does not have a hardware HDMI connector or a SlimPort so I can connect a large screen for presentations or watching video. After looking into MiraCast and ChromeCast I downgraded my opinion to 'IT's OK'.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle !
Reviews.Author: jr Eller
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle ! wish it had a USB slot for printing etc., otherwise it's great! the screen resolution is great!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: terri l. selvey
Reviews.Content: This little baby fits in my purse and does everything my laptop does and even more quickly.  I can evendo dictation on this for my job.  It's more lightweight than the Kindle Fire, which I also love.  I have 4 Kindlesand this one is rarely out of my reach.  I had to really look for the purple edges people were talking about,and with very close scrutiny I saw them, but then immediately forgot they were there.  Not an issue at all.For the price difference my only regret is that I got the 32 instead of the 64.  Maybe next year.  The camera,as some have said, is virtually useless unless you want to take pictures of yourself.  I don't want the bigger tablet because I like to be able to slip it into a regular-sized purse.  I hope someday they come out with a rear facing camera on the 7". I guess that would be my only disappointment, but from the reviews I knew that when I bought it so I still give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" Review
Reviews.Author: Becki Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: I am liking my new Kindle so far very well, I had another Kindle that was 15 months old that would no longer charge or hold a charge. I have spoken with others that have had the same problem. I am just hoping the new Kindle lasts longer than the first one. I have purchased 2 other Kindles that are about 1 year old for my two grandsons and i hope  their Kindles last.

Reviews.Title: REALLY COOL!!
Reviews.Author: Les Mack
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I have a Paperwhite with 3g WI-FI and thisexceeds it by FAR. The 4 G Wi-Fi works reallywell, the images POP out at you from the HDX display it's almost like 3-d. The battery recovery timeis very quick.

Reviews.Title: Talk to the kindle, it listens.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just updated from the original 7 to the new HDX version, and am glad I did. Overall it works better, faster, and so far no problems.It seems to have a bit longer battery life, but that could still be improved. Beautiful new screen image. One new feature though really impressed me. I found it by accident. Speech to Text is activated by a microphone button on the keyboard. It works amazingly well for me,  It was worth the upgrade all by itself. I spent in excess of $100.00 for a program for my PC, and have been disappointed with it. It is difficult to use, requiring many key strokes to get it going, not to mention the necessary use of a headset. The Kindle is very accurate in getting down what I say, not 100% yet, but closer than I can do with my fingers on the PC. Now, all I have to do is learn to speak in commas and periods. That unfortunately it can not do by itself. Just push the microphone button, keep your hand away from the microphone area, and talk.

Reviews.Title: Loving  it
Reviews.Author: Claudine Jancik
Reviews.Content: I  like  everything  about  the  Kindle Fire HDX. It  has  great  color ,  is easy  to  use and  I  can  read  anywhere  day  or  night,  which  was  my  primary  purpose in  buying it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is just as good as an iPAD
Reviews.Author: Tonia Randolph
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  There are so many great things I can say about the Kindle Fire HDX.  The upgrades just only get better and I highly recommend anyone to purchase this especially if you are a work-play type person on the go like I am.  I love all the game, business, book, and etc apps.  Amazon has very good deals on their digital apps/books.  Just make sure you get the protection plan to protect your toy and make the best of all the uses that this wonderfully created device has to offer.  I will forever be a kindle fan.  The price is within my budget.  I love it.  Keep the modern technology of the kindle fire HDX coming!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for display is beautiful and book selection, app selection and movies are great, thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Great Display.  Books looked great,  and is lightweight.  Price is wonderful, battery last a long time. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Audrey Green
Reviews.Content: What can  I say about this Kindle Fire HDX is just what I have been looking for.  Love it and the special offers don't bother me at all.

Reviews.Title: awesome little tablet
Reviews.Author: jonathan Fisk
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet that does it all and for a phenominal price. Its not too big and cumbersome. Easy to carry and android apps galore. Anyone who is considering purchasing a tablet should seriously consider the kindle fire series.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx is an awesome product.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kramer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is perfect. It fast, crystal clear hd screen, and does everything I would want out of a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Definitely top tablet
Reviews.Author: israel perez
Reviews.Content: Great Product. Wish I could've kept it but will consider buying one in the near future. Keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Chres parker
Reviews.Content: Haven't had enough time with it yet but I' m pretty haapy with my HDX so far. I've noticed a few quirks, but it may be just me. Wish it came with iespell checker.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Bobio
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my Kindle Fire HD was refusing to function when there was still about 38% battery life left. The HDX is slimmer, lighter, and the operating system is more user-friendly. There are more pixels so the display is a lot clearer. I was surprised to find the sound quality of the HD is better than the HDX. But the battery life of the HDX is much better. Overall, I'm glad I bought the HDX.

Reviews.Title: Just the fastest period!!
Reviews.Author: obiken "obiken"
Reviews.Content: First of all if you are deciding what is the best tablet good luck, it depends on what you want it for. I owned the Apple mini with Retina, and I will again. However, if you are looking for the fastest WiFi, the best sound BY FAR, the best books, and movies, the Kindle Fire HDX is your huckleberry.You cannot beat the Apple for ease of use, or the apps. IF Kindle had access to all the Apple 3rd party apps, due to the price difference, it would be game over.However for Netflix, and internet browsing its not even close. KFHDX is way faster. So yes, sometimes the experts are right!!

Reviews.Title: Genius Amazon
Reviews.Author: FreedomAndLiberty
Reviews.Content: This product is just awesome. If you want the simple Amazon Prime tool to shop,watch,listen...or need help.. just click mayday....This product actually builds my desire to purchase more from Amazon. Also if i want to install google apps it is possible. Seriously Amazon Prime is just the way to go for all your shopping needs. So ..it has a fast enough processor to game and complete tasks like surf or watch a movie. Oh yeah another big thing was....reading books...this thing makes it easy to read a book....Amazon Prime and this device just works and is a huge solution for many tasks just reach down and pick it up...only thing that I would like to see is Kindles offer more harddrive space....like a 1tb...yeah we are in a time of file servers aka cloud servers...but in times of no internet...a real harddrive is a must...face it 4G/3G is a hoax, its a joke when it comes to internet so don't fall for the 4G lie and highway robbery mobile internet companies charge for internet...Amazon seriously this product and your growing services is on the right track for the future. Just remember don't close off this device to just Amazon...that would be the end of Kindle. I wish I had the money to have several of these devices....sometimes i don't need the full pc desktop but have a certain need and this device makes it possible and does so smoothly very good device very good tool. Keep up the good work Amazon! Amazon has so much potential that could grow alot of business and create alot of jobs....Kindle HDX is worth having! And my boy loves it! I recommend this especially if you are a Amazon user. I used this product for 20+ days or so and I'm getting one for Christmas. Battery life could be better but so could the ram and harddrive...but for what I did the device was not a problem it actually was the solution for many many tasks.  I watched movies, streamed music, watched video, surfed, read articles and books, used the alarm and calender, used yahoo weather app, played games. The only thing i noticed as something it lacked was harddrive space when the Amazon prime video offered to download the movie better quality would require more harddrive space. But this is more of need when traveling through an area where there would be no internet or limited internet. And... Really... the only thing...lacking is my bank roll to buy constantly 24/7 on Amazon with this device..haha...I'm sure i could come up with negatives but this device really is a solution a tool that just works for me.

Reviews.Title: Finally, Amazon got this mostly right!
Reviews.Author: A. Wertheim "werthla"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HD, iPad, and Surface 2 just for background.I have a lot of problems with HD in terms of its claim to being a tablet - the internet is very fussy, it's slow and is simply not reliable as a tablet.  But it's a great E reader.I wanted a good 7 inch tablet.  I bought a returned the Google Nexus 7.  It was great except for no browser having a reading pane which is important in a small tablet.  You would think Google would have this in Chrome but no.  The screen is the best in class.I went to Best Buy and they had the HD and HDX side by side.  I compared the internet and there was no comparison - they HDX was very fast so I bought it to try out.  Happy to report that this is now a true tablet in that the Silk browser is much improved,, the quad core makes all the difference, the internet is now very usable and fast.HDX also has improvements over the HD - you can slide up from the bottom to access recently used programs which is very important if you need to switch between apps since only Surface allows you to keep two apps open simultaneously in the tablet world.  This works better than iPad.A page from other androids - you swipe down to see email and other notifications.The power button is now accessible!Size is smaller and slimmer.Some have noticed that there is a purple haze to the background.  That's true and that's something you have to judge for yourself if it bothers you.There is a limit on the number of tabs you can open on the Silk browser.Battery life is improved over HD.  It now comes with a cable and wall charger.There is no rear camera.  If that's important to you, consider the iPad Mini.  OR you can buy a real camera for the price difference.In summary, there is really no reason to buy the HD unless the price is $100.  The HDX is now a good competitive tablet.  The app store remains a problem if you depend on apps for games.  I have found some surprisingly good specialty apps.This is smaller than the iPad Mini and almost half the price.  Unless you are trapped in the Apple ecosystem and need their apps, (there isn't much you can't get from the web sites) this is a good alternative.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY fantastic
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I had WiFi in my home, so I can enjoy it even more. Love May Day button- the people have really helped me a number of times. Don't understand why my book pages don't turn like the advertisement- someone needs to tell us why. Easy to download- great color and sound too. This is my 4th Kindle-- got to control myself on upgrades BUT the people I have given them to have enjoyed my spending!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Hooker "luv2read"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HDX, it's the perfect adult companion, I take it with me everywhere. It's fully equipped with games, books, movies and much more.It's easy to use and I have to hide it from my husband and two year old daughter who seem to use it more than me. It has a wide variety of free applications and the quality of the Hd screen is perfect for reading a nd viewing movies. It's never a dull moment with the Kindle Fire HDX,  I plan on purchasing two more so I can enjoy it without interruption. Lastly, the price is reasonable, can't be beat!!!

Reviews.Title: It's perfect for mom
Reviews.Author: Greg Shires
Reviews.Content: My mom loves her "basic" kindle.  I wanted to get her one that lights up and has access to internet, facebook, email, etc.  She loves it, so far she still just reads on it but I'm hoping she'll eventually use it for more.

Reviews.Title: The greatest 7" tablet for me!!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Ryker
Reviews.Content: When glancing around for tablets @ Peter Jones' dpt store (John Lewis) in London, the most appealing tablet I noticed was the Kindle Fire HDX 7. Since this tablet cannot yet be purchased in The Netherlands in a store, this was the only chance for me to pick it up and feel and explore it. I loved the design, the feel, the incredible clarity and mega-fast processor.Back home, I tested a lot of tablets at a Dutch local megastore. Google Nexus seemed appealing, then Samsung tab 3.0, but I disliked the shapes, too long/narrow screen proportions. LG Gpad 8.3 was another temptation, but again: that weird long narrow screen? I jumped on to Apple's Ipad Mini 2. Bigger screen than the average 7" and just perfectly proportioned. Simply not being an Apple's type of guy, I hesitated. What held me back at Ipad Mini 2, were the limitations of dropping audio and video files on it. You would have to use Itunes for almost everything and convert many movie files.With Kindle, I wasn't sure about its Amazon-tunnel-vision strategy. But I also read there were a lot of ways to sideload apps outside the Amazon app-convent.From the day I received it (3 days after purchase, this gets UPS delivered to your doorstep and yes, they do ask your neighbours to receive it on your behalf in case you're not at home), I have not regretted this purchase for one second.I like Amazon products a lot. I do read Kindle books. But I like Kobo also. No problem, on youtube there's a perfectly clear instruction video on how to bring Kobo to your Kindle, and the two do peacefully co-exist.Magazines: lovely, cheap and easy to order, a delight to page through on this tablet.PDF files, Word documents: perfect viewing.For more extensive typing, I purchased the Perixx Periboard-805L, which works like a charm as a bluetooth wireless foldable keyboard for my Kindle tablet.Kindle Fire HDX 7 had my first attention, and remained my ultimate choice. Best case to keep it protected in my opinion: Poetic Slimline. Thank you, Amazon! A very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Very Good but not intuitive
Reviews.Author: RetiredDIY
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wanted an e-reader that I could do more with then just read books.  So far I like it very much but find that it does not give great directions for how to use some of its features. I am still trying to discover HOW to sync documents, if I finally get it done I would give this item 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Smith
Reviews.Content: My old Kindle is dying so ordered this one.  It is just incredible so far.  Very easy to set up and use.  The graphics are beautiful and the sound amazing!  I'm not too fond of the cover I ordered because it doesn't hold the stylus - bet that stylus will be lost in a day..lol

Reviews.Title: Mobile movie theatre .
Reviews.Author: alirich
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharper than my hdmi tv .The speaker sound is incredible for its size.I can watch movies and read anywhere and not bother anyone (when using head phones.)The 7 inch fire HDX is so light I can hold it like a book .Excellent wifi reception.Easy to use.I do admit that I watch most on netflix because cheaper and better selection.

Reviews.Title: Crashed constantly. I have lost all hope in Amazon hardware.
Reviews.Author: Sebastian "speelbergo"
Reviews.Content: I still have a Kindle Fire 1st Gen and have used it heavily for two years. I gave it one star because of the charging problems that Amazon wouldn't fix. Besides that and the occasional crash, I have gotten along with my old kindle pretty well since 2011.With the huge number of improvements that come with the Introduction of the HDX I decided to give Amazon tablets another chance.I returned it after one week's use.There were many very nice improvements to both hardware and software, but i'm not going to detail them because the fatal flaws completely overshadowed anything good I can possibly say about it.My Kindle HDX froze 3 times in two days. And when I say froze, i mean it became completely non-responsive for over an hour until i finally gave up and performed a hard reboot. All 3 times I was using the music player, which should be the easiest, most straightforward operation! I hate to part ways with Amazon because their hardware is so inexpensive but I guess you get what you pay for. I got my wife a two year-old USED iPad, and it has worked flawlessly for a year in our possession, never freezing or requiring a hard reboot.

Reviews.Title: What a wonderful item
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Geneva Sones
Reviews.Content: I have never before seen a tablet that was so easy to use as the Kindle HDX7.  The displays are amazing.  It is set up in such a way that it's hard to make a mistake.  It guides you through everything so easily, and you still have the online help you need if you run into a problem.  My nephew has an IPad and was here this weekend and could not believe how easy the Kindle was to use; he is going to get one too.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: This is my third kindle and I love them all. However this one is awesome and the best yet. I love doing business with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift!!!
Reviews.Author: yellowstar2000 "Candice Collins"
Reviews.Content: Love love love this!!! Couldn't be happier!! Well... it could always be better but I have yet to find anything I do not love about it!!

Reviews.Title: This was a Birthday gift for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Bob Feil
Reviews.Content: Totally surprised her with it. She is constantly looking for books to read, now she just looks them up and she is all set. Skypeing our grand kids is a special treat as well,It's like having a lap top only smaller. Great product, would suggest this to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I kinda wish I bought the bigger one but i still love it.  I love that I can borrow a book.

Reviews.Title: An excellent device!
Reviews.Author: Al Carpenter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace an earlier model Kindle Reader for my wife and, already, she loves it!  Bigger screen and easier to use than her smart phone, yet perfect size for her purse and, of course, much more sophisticated than the black and white reader.

Reviews.Title: love it so far
Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I only got this today. The color is amazing!I did download some puff files I cannot find on the Adobe app but their in here somewhere. I'm sure I'll figure it out.Mobile files downloaded great. My books were on I n seconds that I'll had on a kindle app. It's not too heavy not extremely light either. Nice size as I have a tablet and a nook tablet. I like the size of this a lot better and the screen.It's just so bright and vivid. I really haven't used  it for anything else yet but I bet games are amazing.I definitely recommend. I have a HD tablet and this HDX blows the color away. Usage is easy and starts up easily not a lot of work.out of the box which I always dread.  Battery seems to hold well. I've been reading for about 4  hrs and it's half drained. If your considering buying just do it you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" HDX 16GB
Reviews.Author: Lathanette Creasman
Reviews.Content: Ok I am not a techy person but like to keep up with what the new gadgets are. I never buy technical toys as I call them. Family has been trying to get me to get one of these for over a year. Well, I LOVE IT!!!! I got it because I am in a bookclub and everyone uses theirs to for their books and other avenues. I am still a paperbook fan but I love the Kindle Fire HDX. Best investment I have done since a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Bright and Light
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The screen is truly fantastic but the first thing I noticed was how light the device was. It blows my mind how they can pack such technology in such a small package. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My favorite Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my newest Kindle.  This is very fast, very user friendly. I recently lost my laptop, but since I have been using this tablet, I won't replace the laptop.  I have a desktop computer when I want a keyboard, or a big screen for movies.  But, this tablet is fantastic for everything else, all the time, any time.  I check email, watch movies, read books, listen to music. LOVE IT!  I took it to school and let my 5th graders take turns using it for independent reading time.  It made reading so much fun for them. I also used a timer app in class as well.  The battery life is good on this tablet.  I use my other kindles, but this is my favorite one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Oceansky
Reviews.Content: So far I am loving my Kidle Fire HDX.  It is fast on its downloads and I'm still playing with it to get to know all it's features.

Reviews.Title: my thoughts
Reviews.Author: lloyd l bolson
Reviews.Content: device seems to work fine.  I would have given it 5 stars if it had instructions.  Being new to amazon/android platform, I am still trying to get to work in a consistent fashion.

Reviews.Title: Great device!!
Reviews.Author: Melinda Roslin
Reviews.Content: This device is totally plug n play.  Easy to use, navigation is intuitive and it's large enough to read and play games, but small enough to put in my handbag.  I'm reading books again on a regular basis because of this device.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: great kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: Bill Fox
Reviews.Content: I love this thing. The display is awesome and its very fast with a nice processor. Reccomend it to anyone looking for a great tablet for gaming.

Reviews.Title: So much fun
Reviews.Author: Ben and Jess
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I got a Kindle together for christmas and we love it. Easy to use and the picture is amazing. :) thank you

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shirley G
Reviews.Content: Love it! Had one of the first Kindles to come out, never left the house without it! I used it daily! I purchased this one after my sister gave it rave reviews! Have had it only a few days, still trying to discover all I can do with it. Have down loaded songs and books on it, I Love the color on it! Have watched a couple movies on it, love the picture and sound quality. I love that it is light weight. Am VERY satisfied with my purchase! I never leave the house with out it! Would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves to read, listen to music or watch movies. The price was affordable too! Can't say enough good things about it!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: catlib55
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. I am a prime member, and getting videos through prime on this is seamless and fast. I also play a few games which are fun to do. And what I use it for mostly is reading, and getting books through the Amazon store is simple and quick. Also, it came the day after I ordered it, which was a really nice surprise. I expected it in two days, but it came in one day. Way to go, Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Joseph Burns
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is a solid tablet. You get the greatest bang for your buck with this little thing. I dont really care for owning a tablet but it sure is great having one around.

Reviews.Title: Mother, welome to the 21'st century...
Reviews.Author: Kevin Miller
Reviews.Content: Ok, fist let me start off by saying job well done Amazon on the Kindle Fire HDX. I bought this item to bring my 70 year old mother into the 21'st century because it has the mayday button. I don't live in the same state as my mother so helping her with technology via the phone I knew would be daunting and the mayday button was the best solution. I had the item mailed to me so I could set it up for her and absolutely fell in love with it. I have a Microsoft Surface Pro which is great for doing college work, or other computer related things. The Surface too can also double as a tablet (but because of the weight) not for long period of time. The HDX was so light, the resolution was fabulous for watching movies and to my dismay, the sound was better than on my Surface Pro!! Amazon, if your intention was to help those whom would not otherwise get connected... You hit the nail on the head with this product. *****APPLAUSE******

Reviews.Title: My first tablet and I love it!
Reviews.Author: Mekare
Reviews.Content: First of all, I must say that this is my first tablet.  After reading reviews and doing product comparing on tablets, I decided on a Kindle Fire HDX.First impressions:I loved the look and feel but since this was my first tablet, I wish Amazon would of included more information and instructions.  It took me a few minutes just to unlock the screen.The plugin came with an adapter and I was thrilled because I didn't want to have to use my computer to charge.  The angled way that the cord goes in is a nice feature but made me uneasy the first time I inserted the power cord.Setup was very easy once I remembered all my login and password information.Charging time was about 6 hours which isn't too bad but I was quite impatient waiting.The first app that I downloaded was Candy Crush.  That process was easy and only took a few minutes.After a month of use...I love it.  The picture quality is excellent.  The sound quality is better than you'd expect.  I play a few games, browse Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest with ease.  You'd think you were on a computer with as fast as things load.  I've watched a few things and was really surprised by how good it looked.  I've also visited websites that aren't "made for mobile" and was thrilled that they work perfectly.Although I love my HDX there's a few things that I wish were better, improved, etc....Battery life.  I mainly just play a few games and browse a few places but the battery seems to drain kind of fast.  Just doing a few simple things each evening and I have to charge it every other day.  I couldn't imagine how often it would need to charge if I used it throughout the day.Availability of apps.  There's so many apps and games that are only available for Apple and Google so I wish there was more compatibility with Amazon and the Kindle Fire.Ability to watch YouTube videos without an app would be nice.Ability to play Java or Adobe Flash games or videos would be wonderful.Some questions...Care and maintenance.  What's the best way to ensure overall battery life?  Should I let the battery drain completely sometimes?  I have a case.  Do I need a screen protector?  What's the best way to clean the screen?With winter now here, how does the HDX do in cool or cold weather?  Should I keep it at a certain temperature for use or let it warm up before using?  What about summer heat?Like with computers do I need to clear the cache sometimes?  How do I maintain it?  Is there maintenance like on computers that should be done?  Are Kindle Fires at risk for trojans, virus', malware, adware, etc?  Is there a firewall?  What can I do to protect my HDX?Overall, I am VERY happy with my HDX and I'm glad I chose it.  I would recommend it to anyone that was wanting a tablet.  There's many things it can do and it is good for almost anything and anyone.  Amazon Prime is a great add-on and the benefits are well worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Vickie Stinnett
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX 7" for about 5 days and I LOVE it.  I have an iPad but I like this much better and the price is right.  I have been watching movies, TV shows, and I am really enjoying Amazon's Alpha House.  One of the best purchases I have made in a long time. I just may just sell my iPad.  If you are on the fence on this come on down, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "aunt carol of 4"
Reviews.Content: I had one of the original Kindle Fires - which I love & still have.  I just wanted to upgrade to the newest available Kindle Fire. I've had it about a week now & it is even better than I hoped for.  I can now keep my laptop in the office b/c the web capabilities are so much better.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet.
Reviews.Author: paigewild
Reviews.Content: Great tablet its just as good if not better than the Nexus Tablet. I Luv it..... This tablet is a must buy......

Reviews.Title: Should have got the 64GB
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Milo"
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the original 8GB fire to the the HDX with 32GB and my only regret is not getting the 64GB.  I mostly use the Fire for reading, audiobooks, and podcasts.Negatives: No SD card reader.  No pre-installed podcasting app.Positives:  Nice hardware specs.  Fast, thin, and sharp.

Reviews.Title: Just got mine today
Reviews.Author: Ryan Kohlhaas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a gift this Christmas. I bought it on the first day of Cyber Monday when it was 50$ off and honestly if you know how good the HDX is as a tablet in itself...it is totally worth it.I was alittle scared when I received my package today because it looked squashed. Amazon can't help the parcels journey but they put the Kindle in a tiny box with no protection like  bubble wrap etc. I turned it on to make sure everything worked and it is fantastic. The processor is super fast ( Better version of the new Nexus' 7), the screen is beautiful ( better than the iPad Air ) and it is barely 11 oz. in weight.I read alot of negative reviews about a "defect" with the lighting on the screen. If you do your research, the Kindle uses blue LEDs instead of white. The blue backlight in the device allows less power consumption and it provides the screen with a vibrant crisp image.The bottom line is, If you are getting a tablet as a gift this season, right now at this price, it doesn't get any better. The Kindle Fire HDX is a tablet that is proving to out do Apple and Google. If you are tech savy you can side load Google Apps or even root the device now. Anyone who says otherwise is delusional

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX is OKX!
Reviews.Author: Robb Sinert
Reviews.Content: Wow. More than I expected. Faster than my desktop. Learning all the swipe techniques and enjoying it so far. One week owner.

Reviews.Title: Nay-sayers be damned. This Tablet Sings!

Reviews.Content: I've found that many of the gripes about this tablet have an easy work-around. it's very fast, fluid, and feels great in the hand. The screen is gorgeous!

Reviews.Title: GOOD PURCHASE!!!!

Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire & inch" HDX an so far I love it took me a while to learn how to set up certain applications I wanted on it but I was really disappointed that it didn't come with a paper book instead of having to go on my computer to find out how to set up youtube and other programs

Reviews.Title: Almost 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: T. Monk-Shadee
Reviews.Content: The HDX is just what I wanted! Would be 5 stars if there were a more interesting  and diverse selection of apps.

Reviews.Title: love!
Reviews.Author: mandolin
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE! so glad i didn't spend the extra money on an ipad. this is perfect for me in every way, especially when it comes to reading.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
